attributes.action: not charge the workers of manchester to pay for public transport improvements via the congestion charge.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is unfair that workers in manchester will be taxed £1,200 to travel to and from work.  The tax is not based on either an ability to pay or the enviromental effect of driving.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
